import axios from 'axios'; import image from '../image/plane3.jpg'; import React, { useState , useContext} from 'react'; import { useNavigate, Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { AuthContext } from '../context/AuthContext'; const Create = () => { const navigate = useNavigate(); const [title, setTitle] = useState(''); const [date, setDate] = useState(''); const [content, setContent] = useState(''); const { username } = useContext(AuthContext); // Retrieve the username and setUserName from the AuthContext const sendDataToAPI = (event) => { event.preventDefault(); // Prevent default form submission axios .post(`http://localhost:2345/blog/create`, { title, author: username, // Use the username obtained from the AuthContext date, content, }) .then(() => { navigate('/home'); }) .catch((error) => { console.error('Error:', error); }); }; return (

Create Blog



setTitle(e.target.value)} className="form-control form-control-lg" id="exampleInputEmail1" aria-describedby="emailHelp" placeholder="Title" />

setDate(e.target.value)} className="form-control form-control-lg" id="exampleInputPassword1" placeholder="date" />

setContent(e.target.value)} className="form-control form-control-lg" id="exampleInputPassword1" placeholder="Content" />

); }; export default Create;
